comments.body: The docs for particle/position/velocity talk about a "particle". We should probably explain the particle angle here or define those methods in terms of the simulation's position; and then mention that position is usually mapped to scroll offset.
Just saying 'combined' is a bit oversimplifying it. We should say something to the effect of 'behaviors not specified by BouncingScrollPhysics will defer to AlwaysScrollPhysics'.
